Package com.facebook.buck.core.model.targetgraph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph
    Contains common objects used during BuildRule creation in DescriptionWithTargetGraph.createBuildRule(com.facebook.buck.core.model.targetgraph.BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph, com.facebook.buck.core.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.core.description.BuildRuleParams, T).
    DescriptionProvider
    An ExtensionPoint which provides a way to register an arbitrary set of DescriptionWithTargetGraphs.
    DescriptionWithTargetGraph<T>
    The Source of Truth about a BuildRule, providing mechanisms to expose the arguments that rules derived from the Buildable take and providing a factory for those BuildRules.
    NodeCopier
    Provides method for copying TargetNodes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImmutableBuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph
    Immutable implementation of BuildRuleCreationContextWithTargetGraph.
    TargetGraph
    Represents the graph of TargetNodes constructed by parsing the build files.
    TargetGraphAndBuildTargets
    Holds a TargetGraph and a set of BuildTargets.
    TargetGraphAndBuildTargets.Builder
    Builds instances of type TargetGraphAndBuildTargets.
    TargetNode<T,U extends DescriptionWithTargetGraph<T>>
    A TargetNode represents a node in the target graph which is created by the Parser as a result of parsing BUCK files in a project.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TargetGraph.NoSuchNodeException
